justsudoku

Maintainerandrewjmichaud@gmail.com

GTK.GUI

Contents

  • Classes

Description

This module contains a datatype for a Sudoku application GUI, which includes everything I think is necessary for a reasonable Sudoku application. It also includes a method for initializing a GUI, a method for binding all of the elements together, and exports the mainWin field so code importing this module can actually use the GUI.

Synopsis

  • data GUI
  • initSudokuGUI :: IO GUI
  • mainWin :: GUI -> Window
